actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations and Nutrition

official_title: To exclude from income amounts received under part A of title IV of the Social Security Act for the purposes of determining the amount of benefits to be provided under the Food Stamp Act of 1977.

summary.text: Excludes from income under the Food Stamp Act of 1977 (food stamp assistance) any payments received under part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: To exclude from income amounts received under part A of title IV of the Social Security Act for the purposes of determining the amount of benefits to be provided under the Food Stamp Act of 1977.
